greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of shapes of balanced 8-ary trees with n nodes, where a tree is balanced if the total number of nodes in subtrees corresponding to the branches of any node differ by at most one.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..585
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; local m, r; if n<2 then 1 else
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 21 2013
